model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the entry point into the model of the tic tac toe game. It provides methods to manipulate the board and play the game of ticTacToe.
    Author:
    {}rpheus

        public void play(Move move)
        sets a cell of the board to the value of the token carried by the move

      • getCell

        public java.lang.String getCell(int i,
                       int j)
        gets the state at coordinates (i,j) on the board.
        Parameters:
        i - (row of the board)
        j - (column of the board)
        Returns:
        String (state of that particular cell)
